content.rendered: Leons’ Fuel Dispenser control card is all one solution for fluid dispenser automation line. Its include features such as multi function Keypad, larger segment led display,error buzzer indication, Tank level indication,thermal printer etc. Moreover, It works on different communication protocols like GSM-GPRS, Bluetooth, CAN, Ethernet, I2C, SPI, UART, RS232 & RS485. For information Check Fuel dispenser control card brochure.

excerpt.rendered:
• Multi Functional 6×6 keypad
  • Larger segment LCD display
  • Tank level indication
  • Flow Meter Pulse Sensing
  • RFID based dispensing
